summary: Corrected Typst Neovim recommendations: typst.vim is NOT recommended (VimScript, treesitter incompatible); modern 2026 setup uses tinymist LSP + nvim-treesitter (typst parser builtin) + typst-preview.nvim only - no additional syntax plugin needed

artifacts.summary: Follow-up research correcting research-001.md recommendations with modern 2026 Typst Neovim ecosystem analysis

next_steps: Run /plan 694 to create implementation plan incorporating both research reports
